form_description: Note: This co-teacher evaluation form is for teachers to evaluate TTC graduates while fulfilling their co-teaching requirement

user_confirmation_email.message:
Dear {i_fname} {i_lname},

We appreciate you taking the time out to complete this Feedback Form. THANK YOU!

Jai Gurudev!
TTC Desk
user_confirmation_email.subject: Your feedback for {i_ttc_graduate_name} has been submitted

owner_confirmation_email.message:
Dear TTC Desk,

{i_fname} {i_lname} has submitted feedback for {i_ttc_graduate_name} for the course from the {i_course_start} - {i_course_end}

Jai Gurudev
TTC Desk
owner_confirmation_email.subject: {i_fname} {i_lname} has submitted post TTC feedback for {i_ttc_graduate_name}

questions.question: TTC Graduate Name
questions.helper: The TTC graduate you co-taught the course with

questions.question: TTC Graduate Email
Course Start Date (mm/dd/yyyy)
questions.helper: The start date of the course you co-taught

questions.question: Course End Date (mm/dd/yyyy)
questions.helper: The end date of the course you co-taught

questions.question: Course City
Course State
What was the format of the course that you co-taught?
First Name
Last Name
Cell Phone
Home Phone
Email Address (artofliving.org)
questions.helper: If you do not have an artofliving.org email ID yet, please get one by submitting a request HERE before you submit this form

questions.question: Email Address (other)
Did they show initiative, leadership in organizing this course from start to end? Please explain their strengths and weaknesses that you observed through the organizing process.
How would you rate this candidate on a scale of 5, 1 being the lowest and 5 being the highest rating, for their communication in the following categories
Fluency in spoken English - grammar, accent, sentence formation
Written English - grammar, spelling, sentence formation
Ability to speak confidently in front of a group of 10+ people
Authentic connection with the group they are speaking to
Interactive Style of communication
Presence
Naturalness
General Awareness on what is appropriate to say in front of a group
If you gave them a score less than 2 for any of the categories, please give details on why you gave a low score?
questions.helper: If not applicable, please put N/A in the box below

questions.question: Do they have a good understanding of the knowledge of the 5 course points. Please comment.
Were they interactive with the delivery of the knowledge points? Did they listen to the participants and build the point around what was being said? Please comment.
Did they lead any games? Please comment on their ability to give clear instruction and their playfulness in engaging people in the game.
What processes did they lead? Please comment on feedback leading yoga and other processes (example: eye gazing, life story, enthusiasm etc.).
Please comment on their attentiveness to the participants needs.
Please share any other areas of improvement that you suggest for this candidate or anything else you would like to share with TTC Desk.
On a scale of 5, 1 being the lowest and 5 being highest, rate this candidate on their readiness as of today, to lead (teach) a course on their own.
